aboutus_1: As pioneers in developing programs and unique solutions in the technology sector, management systems and online modern shopping, we are working to launch the first 3D modern virtual city that simulates our reality and meets the requirements of the present, combining social and commercial communication in a modern and entertaining way, relying mainly on the latest technologies and techniques to remain in direct contact with everything new. You will be able to roam the outside world from the comfort of your home!
aboutus_2: One of the most important services provided by Chick Chack city is a 3D virtual mall that contains integrated services of stores, restaurants, and various service centers in which it is marketed through virtual roaming and augmented reality using mobile devices (smart phones) and virtual reality devices (glasses).
contuctus_p: We are pleased for contacting us, and always here to serve you!
privacy_1: - It is the official website for the online store platform.
privacy_2: -  We can be reached via email at info@chickchack.net.
privacy_3: - For every visitor to our webpage on the Internet, you must ensure that our web server does not automatically recognize any domain or email address information. We collect the email addresses of those who contact us via email. The information we collect is used for internal review and then discarded. We use cookies to allow chickchack customers to log into their account.
privacy_4: - If you do not want to receive an email from us in the future, please let us know by sending us an email at the above address. If you provide us with your postal address online, you will only receive the information that you provided us with your address. People who provide us with their phone numbers over the Internet only receive a phone call from us with information regarding requests they have placed online.
privacy_5: - We do not share or have any special relationships with any of the advertising companies. Upon request, we provide website visitors with access to all information [including proprietary information] that we hold about them.
privacy_6: - We have appropriate security measures in place in our physical facilities to protect against the loss, misuse or alteration of the information we have collected from you on our site.
privacy_7: - If you feel that this website is not following the stated information policy, you may contact us at the addresses or phone numbers below.
